featured.text: Young Maasai men spear animals and thus pose a threat to elephants; Kamba men are mainly farmers and are not a danger to elephants.
So the stunt industry is probably in no immediate danger of dying off.

What is the main idea of this passage? (A) Elephants use sight and smell to detect danger.
To warn about the dangers of drinking energy drinks mixed with alcohol.

other.text: These patterns actually help the fish to hide from danger among roots and plants.
Nature provides other forms of protection 36 environmental dangers.
Stricter measures have been taken to potential dangers concerning cigarette-smoking.

This passage is a story about (A) a man who enjoys dangers and risks.

The danger of a fast-moving train.
The weather bureau _____ that the typhoon would bring strong winds and heavy rains, and warned everyone of the possible danger.
There are thousands of reefs in the world; 33 , however, they are now in serious danger.
But, since our space journey started we have left so much trash there that scientists are now concerned that if we don’t clean it up, we may all be in mortal danger.

Due to numerous accidents that occurred while people were playing Pokémon GO, players were advised to be _____ of possible dangers in the environment.

definition.zh_def: 危險，可能造成傷害或損失的情況或事物。
definition.en_def: The possibility of suffering harm or injury.
definition.example: The storm posed a danger to the small boats in the harbor.
